message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. This unique offering holds immense value, estimated at $1,500,000 to you, based on its capabilities and benefits. We are excited to offer this opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $1,200,000. This price reflects our commitment to making high-quality products accessible while ensuring a fair return for us. We believe this is an excellent deal that aligns well with both our business objectives and your needs.

Thanks for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value you're placing on the product, my budget for this purchase is $1,000,000.  I'm confident this is a fair price considering its worth to you and the potential benefits it offers. I'm eager to finalize this deal, so let's see if we can find common ground.

Thank you for your interest, Bob. After careful consideration, I understand your position and would like to propose a compromise. Given the significant value you place on the product, I am willing to negotiate further. My counteroffer is to sell the product to you for $1,100,000. This price reflects a balance between the intrinsic value of the product and your budget constraints. I hope this proposal will be more agreeable and allows us to move forward with the transaction.
